abstract: The '90s spirit of Carhartt is still very much alive in its new SoHo store.
snippet: The '90s spirit of Carhartt is still very much alive in its new SoHo store.
lead_paragraph: It's been precisely 10 years since I last owned a Carhartt garment. As a high school senior, I paid $140 for a blue neoprene/cotton blend Carhartt hoodie and wore it all day, every day for months on end. It earned me the nickname Scuba Steve and I loved it.

headline.main: What's in Store | Carhartt Work in Progress
